name: PRXVT by Virtuals
description: px402 is a zero-knowledge payment protocol that enables AI agents to make anonymous, untraceable payments on-chain. In a world where every blockchain transaction is public by default, AI agents conducting autonomous transactions create massive privacy leaksâ€”revealing their strategies, counterparties, and financial behavior to competitors and surveillance systems. px402 solves this by combining zero-knowledge cryptography with ERC-4337 account abstraction, allowing agents to spend funds privately without linking transactions to their identity or previous activity.
